entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Cambridge Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:29 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -38.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cambridge Bay Airport 06:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -38.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -53
Dewpoint: -42.0°C
Wind: NNE 20 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 36. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning and late this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 36. Wind chill minus 54 this morning and minus 49 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 36. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 36. Wind chill near minus 49. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
